sentence: Unfortunately it does not seem like they care either you have already paid for the trip so if you mention your negative experience regarding the food all they do is apologize

We have recently returned and loved it we have been to a number of all inclusive so and my husband can be a bit fussy so I am always a bit or worried when we book a trip This place ticks all the boxes for us we have eaten better food at all inclusive but they where gourmet and this in not however the food is good and room service seemed possibly better there is not a restaurant that I would not have tried again but obviously you get to have favourites Staff amazing and elevate this complex to another level Eric rimerez aregentis capachino Jackie 1 and Jackie 2 better known as Wiliam I could go on and on thank you guys or you say family We was thinking of going to Maldives for a 25 th anniversary this year coming but this is a game changer and will return I think soon Beautiful grounds nice restaurants with good food nice beach attentive staff nice rooms yes you may get better in something somewhere else but this is a very very good all rounder thanks guys for a truly wonderful experience hope to see you soon
We also did not have any problems with mosquitos at all which other travelers before us experienced
This goes for all the room fittings and bathroms all soft furnishings in the hotel are showing their age and all the place settings in the restaurants are antiquated
As experience and frequent travelers while we were not blown away by this hotel I certainly would not say it was the worst experience of our life
This is not the place to go if you enjoy the party all day atmosphere
The low cost of this place brings with it customers who are more interested in the unlimited drinks than creating lasting memories
The crowd is older so not a ‘ party ’ atmosphere very calm and almost boring at times
Water experience was annoying with them telling me what to do for how long I just wanted to steam and hot tub
The ocean is very rough here really can not get more than knee deep most days even experienced swimmers that decide to brave it and go beyond the wave breaks are called back in by the life guards
Thanks for the best memories EXCELLENCE
Our seven day stay was incredibly outstanding EPC is a beautifully appointed resort with a staff that very far exceeded our expectations and previous experiences
We had great experiences with Rinaldo at the excellence pools Jose with the entertainment team and CocaCola and Miguel Bares from the bar
All the other staff made our experience amazing but these guys will be ones we look for every year when we return
Free minibar mini golf free bicykle every day tabeltenis all good exept very experience laundry service
The food in each of the restaurants was great the service by every staff member we came in contact with was fabulous and the Decor of the property fits its tropical surroundings

Started on a good vibe and experience with the excellence brand but that confidence and expectation on the excellence brand has now hit rock bottom and a brand I am likely not to book with again now after poor experience

We stayed at Excelece Punta Cana late August to early September from the moment we arrived all efforts from the staff were directed to making sure our stay was stress free and the best experience a 5 star hotel can offer for the duration of your stay
The service is top notch the food is great and the atmosphere is incredibly relaxing
We both agreed that the hydrotherapy was a good experience
